bill.title: Relating To Water Common Carriers.
bill.description: Removes the requirement that water common carriers secure prior approval of the public utilities commission to enter into long term leases of more than three years and leverage leases. Effective 7/1/3000.

history.action: Referred to TRN, CPC, FIN, referral sheet 1
Bill scheduled to be heard by TRN on Tuesday, 01-31-23 10:00AM in House conference room 312 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Todd, Kila, Aiu, Hashimoto, Kitagawa, Marten, Onishi, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from TRN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 11) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with Representative(s) Ganaden, Hussey-Burdick, Perruso voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Kapela voting no (1) and Representative(s) Amato, Nakashima, Woodson excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Thursday, 02-09-23 2:00PM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
The committee(s) on CPC recommend(s) that the measure be deferred.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Thursday, 02-16-23 2:00PM in conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Sayama, Belatti, Hashem, Gates, Onishi, Tam, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Amato, Hussey-Burdick, Lowen; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 770), recommending referral to FIN.

Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) Hussey-Burdick voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Kapela voting no (1) and Representative(s) Marten excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-24-23 1:30PM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Kitagawa, Aiu, Chun, Kahaloa, Kila, Kobayashi, Lamosao, Morikawa, Nishimoto, Takenouchi, Alcos, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Poepoe; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Garrett.
